evidence.text: Plaintiffs—a collection of unions, non-profit organizations, and local governments—now ask the Court to approve a preliminary injunction that pauses further RIFs and reorganization of the executive branch for the duration of this lawsuit.

extracted.value: duration of the lawsuit: Order Granting Preliminary Injunction
